ComicInfo.Summary: Now a six-member team, the Mystery Society are off on several missions at once, including: retrieving Edgar Allan Poe’s stolen skull; fighting the government’s fear/smear campaign to undermine MS’s credibility; and staving off an all-out assault on their headquarters by arch nemesis, General Powell. With the help of Jules Verne, whose brain is now inside a robot, team leaders Nick Hammond and Anastasia Collins will be sure to live to see another day! We hope!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 18:24:29. [CVDB234567]
ComicInfo.Characters: Ana Collins, Nick Hammond, Nina Atomic, Sally Atomic, Secret Skull, Verne
